original_text:
Book of Souls II: El Dorado
La slot Book of Souls II: El Dorado è un gioco basato sulla storia, ricco di azione e ricco di caratteristiche. Anche se la storia in sé, così come il tema Maya, può sembrare un po’ abusato dall’industria, è comunque in grado di attirare l’attenzione dei giocatori, soprattutto considerando tutto il lavoro che il team di sviluppatori ha messo nella visualizzazione e nella presentazione. Seguite un archeologo avventuroso nella giungla amazzonica e scoprite un tempio dimenticato. Le sue sale contengono due tipi di trottole gratuite, oltre a un Libro sacro, che contiene ricette per la ricchezza.
Spearhead Studios, ex GiG Games, l’autoproclamato “game changers”, ha fatto un passo avanti e ha aggiunto una svolta al gioco di base che finora nessuno degli altri titoli ha fatto. Gli Snake Wilds sono una caratteristica casuale nel gioco di base dove un certo numero di wilds sono aggiunti a posizioni casuali sui rulli per fornire più potenziale per segnare una vittoria.
Una grafica avventurosa
Lara Jones è un’archeologa britannica in missione per scoprire alcune delle tombe e dei templi dimenticati, e una piramide Maya raffigurata in questo gioco è la sua ultima ossessione. Se la descrizione del personaggio suona molto simile a un altro famoso raider virtuale, beh – è perché ha lo stesso aspetto. Ma d’altra parte, chi se ne frega? Finché il titolo offre un gioco d’azione con bobine che girano, non importa nient’altro.
E questo gioco è sicuramente un blockbuster. Il compito della slot è quello di trovare un sacro Libro delle Anime – una chiave per i misteri e le ricchezze Maya. Accanto a Lara, un membro di un’organizzazione segreta è anche alla ricerca di questa fonte di potere, quindi c’è un po’ di calore e di tensione tra la protagonista e l’antagonista. Ci sono anche maschere e totem sacri Maya, oltre a icone stilizzate di carte. Non vedo l’ora di vedere effetti visivi e sonori di qualità, il gioco è iniziato!
Funzioni e simboli della Slot Machine
Book of Souls II: El Dorado è una video slot con cinque rulli, tre file e 10 linee di pagamento fisse. Le dimensioni delle scommesse partono da 0,10 crediti per i rulli bassi, mentre i rulli alti possono aumentare fino a 100 crediti. Alta volatilità non significa bassa RTP come dimostra lo studio con il 96,90% che hanno dato la loro ultima creazione. Andando con i tempi moderni, il gioco è ottimizzato per i cellulari, ma ha un aspetto e una giocabilità altrettanto buona su un PC desktop.
Come previsto, la slot è a tema avventura, con l’eroina che è Lara Jones che entra in un antico tempio Maya. L’archeologa trasformata in cacciatrice di tesori è alla ricerca del mistico Libro delle Anime, che può sbloccare le leggendarie ricchezze nascoste all’interno della gigantesca struttura di pietra. Naturalmente, sui rulli c’è un cattivo che cerca di impedire a Lara di portarsi a casa le ricchezze. La finestra del gioco si trova di fronte all’ingresso del tempio nascosto, con i simboli della paga appoggiati su pietre che devono essere rimosse per poter entrare. Le pietre tremano ad ogni nuovo capitombolo di simboli di pagamento, mentre una colonna sonora sospesa accresce le aspettative di trovare i vasti tesori.
Tutti i simboli di pagamento si tengono su pietre giganti che rotolano sulla finestra del gioco invece della solita rotazione del mulinello. La parte bassa è composta da regali di carte in stile Maya da 10 agli assi, mentre i simboli premium sono due artefatti Maya, il cattivo che mette in campo una pistola e la stessa Lara Jones. Paga per un singolo cinque di una gamma da 10x a 500x la tua scommessa. L’antico Libro delle Anime, dal design intricato, è il simbolo della dispersione e della selvatichezza sui rulli.
Colpisci almeno tre scatters ovunque sui rulli per innescare 10 rotazioni libere, che possono essere innescate nuovamente all’infinito. Inoltre, una vincita di 2x, 20 e 200x viene assegnata per tre, quattro e cinque scatter. Prima dell’inizio del bonus round, uno dei nove simboli a pagamento regolari viene selezionato come simbolo speciale. Quando c’è abbastanza terra su un giro libero, essi si espanderanno verticalmente per coprire l’intera bobina e le vincite di premio per tutte le linee di paga, che vengono pagate in cima a qualsiasi potenziale linea di vincita. Avrà bisogno di almeno tre simboli a basso pagamento o di almeno due simboli premio in qualsiasi punto dello schermo per vederli espandersi e premiare una vittoria.
Questo è, naturalmente, il momento in cui la slot può produrre la massima vincita con un solo giro. Il simbolo speciale selezionato deve essere Lara Jones e se cinque terreni in vista attraverso i rulli, si espanderanno per pagare 10 volte la vincita di una singola linea per un cinque, che è 500x la puntata, per un totale di 5.000x la puntata.
Altre Slot Machine simili
Book of Dead, la Slot Machine prodotta da Play ‘N Go che ti porta a fare un viaggio nel popolare Antico Egitto permette di atterrare simboli disegnati in modo eccellente, storicamente presenti nel paese nordafricano, attraverso cinque rulli e 10 linee di pagamento. Il gioco offre la possibilità di una solida vincita, con un simbolo a pagamento di 1000x sulla linea di scommessa. Le dieci linee di pagamento possono accettare scommesse a partire da 10 centesimi e fino a 100 euro e i giocatori possono atterrare una funzione bonus e ottenere l’aiuto dei giri gratuiti del gioco atterrando tre o più dei simboli del libro, che rappresentano la dispersione del gioco. Il giocatore può riattivare altri 10 giri gratis con un altro giro aiutato dallo scatter vince.

raw_translation.response:
Book of Souls II: El Dorado is a history-based slot game that is action-packed and filled with features. Although the story and the Maya theme may seem overused by the industry, it still manages to grab the attention of players, especially with the amount of effort the development team has put into the visuals and presentation. Follow an adventurous archaeologist through the Amazon jungle and discover a forgotten temple. Its halls contain two types of free spins, as well as a sacred book that contains the recipe for wealth.

Spearhead Studios, formerly known as GiG Games, self-proclaimed "game changers," has taken a step forward and added a twist to the base game that no other titles have done so far. Snake Wilds are a random feature in the base game where a certain number of wilds are added to random positions on the reels to provide more potential for scoring a win.

A daring graphic design

Lara Jones is a British archaeologist on a mission to discover some forgotten tombs and temples, and a Mayan pyramid depicted in this game is her latest obsession. If the character description sounds very similar to another famous virtual raider, well - that's because she looks the same. But who cares? As long as the title offers a action-packed game with spinning reels, nothing else matters.

And this game is definitely a blockbuster. The task of the slot is to find a sacred Book of Souls - a key to Maya mysteries and riches. Alongside Lara, a member of a secret organization is also searching for this power source, so there's a bit of heat and tension between the protagonist and the antagonist. There are also sacred masks and totems of the Maya, as well as stylized icons of cards. I can't wait to see the high-quality visual and sound effects, the game has started!

Features and symbols of the slot machine

Book of Souls II: El Dorado is a video slot with five reels, three rows, and 10 fixed paylines. Bet sizes start at 0.10 credits for low rollers, while high rollers can increase up to 100 credits. High volatility does not mean low RTP as shown by the studio with the 96.90% they gave to their latest creation. Moving with the times, the game is optimized for mobile but looks and plays equally good on a desktop PC.

As expected, the slot is an adventure-themed one, with the heroine being Lara Jones entering an ancient Maya temple. The archaeologist turned treasure hunter is searching for the mystical Book of Souls, which can unlock the legendary riches hidden within the massive stone structure. Naturally, on the reels, there's a bad guy trying to stop Lara from taking home the riches. The game window is in front of the entrance to the hidden temple, with pay symbols resting on stones that need to be removed in order to enter. The stones shake with each new tumble of paying symbols, while a suspenseful soundtrack increases the expectations of finding vast treasures.

All paying symbols stand on giant rocks that roll on the game window instead of the usual reel spin. The lower part is made up of Maya-style card gifts from 10s to aces, while the premium symbols are two Maya artifacts, the bad guy who brings out a gun, and the same Lara Jones. They pay for a single five of a range from 10x to 500x your bet. The intricate looking ancient Book of Souls is the scatter and wild symbol on the reels.

Hit at least three scatters anywhere on the reels to trigger 10 free spins, which can be re-triggered indefinitely. Additionally, a win of 2x, 20x, and 200x is awarded for three, four, and five scatters. Before the start of the bonus round, one of the nine regular pay symbols is selected as the special symbol. When enough land on a free spin, they expand vertically to cover the entire reel, and prize wins for all paylines are paid on top of any potential line win. It will need at least three low paying symbols or at least two premium symbols anywhere on the screen to see them expand and award a win.

This is, of course, the moment when the slot can produce the maximum win with a single spin. The selected special symbol must be Lara Jones herself, and if five land in view across the reels, they will expand to pay 10 times the win of a single line for a five, which is 500x the bet, for a total of 5,000x the bet.

Similar slot machines

Book of Dead, the slot machine produced by Play 'N Go that takes you on a journey through popular Ancient Egypt allows you to land excellently drawn symbols historically present in the North African country, on five reels and 10 paylines. The game offers the chance of a solid win, with a 1000x-paying premium symbol on the bet line. The ten paylines can accept bets starting from 10 cents and up to 100 euros, and players can land a bonus feature and get help from the game's free spins by landing three or more of the book symbols, which represent the game's scatter. The player can reactivate another 10 free spins with another scatter win.

Follow an adventurous archaeologist through the Amazon jungle and discover a forgotten temple. Its rooms contain two types of free spins, as well as a Sacred Book that contains recipes for wealth.

Spearhead Studios, formerly known as GiG Games, the self-proclaimed "game changers," has added a twist to the base game that no other title has done so far. The Snake Wilds feature is a random feature in the base game where a certain number of wilds are added to random positions on the reels to provide more potential for scoring a win.

The graphics are adventurous and engaging. Lara Jones, a British archaeologist, is on a mission to discover some of the forgotten tombs and temples, and a Maya pyramid depicted in this game is her latest obsession. The task of the slot is to find a Sacred Book of Souls - a key to the mysteries and riches of the Maya. Accompanied by a member of a secret organization who is also searching for this source of power, there is some heat and tension between the protagonist and the antagonist. Book of Souls II: El Dorado is a video slot with five reels, three rows, and 10 fixed paylines. Bet sizes start at 0.10 credits for low rollers, while high rollers can increase up to 100 credits. The game is optimized for mobile devices, but it looks and plays just as good on a desktop PC.

As expected, the slot is an adventure-themed game, with the heroine being Lara Jones, who enters an ancient Maya temple. The archaeologist turned treasure hunter is in search of the mystical Book of Souls, which can unlock the legendary riches hidden within the massive stone structure. Naturally, there is a villain on the reels who tries to prevent Lara from taking home the riches. The game window is located in front of the entrance to the hidden temple, with the pay symbols perched on stones that must be removed before entering. The stones tremble with each new cascade of paying symbols, while a suspenseful soundtrack increases the anticipation of finding vast treasures.

The lower part consists of Maya-style card gifts from ten to aces, while the premium symbols are two Maya artifacts, the villain who brings a gun into play, and Lara Jones herself. Hit at least three scatters anywhere on the reels to trigger 10 free spins, which can be re-triggered infinitely. Also, a win of 2x, 20, and 200x is awarded for three, four, and five scatters. Before the start of the bonus round, one of the nine regular paying symbols is selected as a special symbol. When enough land appears on a free spin, they will expand vertically to cover the entire reel, and prize wins for all pay lines are paid on top of any potential line wins. It will need at least three low-paying symbols or at least two premium symbols on any position on the screen to see them expand and reward a win.

This is, of course, the moment when the slot can produce the maximum payout with a single spin. The selected special symbol must be Lara Jones, and if five land in view across the reels, they will expand to pay out 10 times the win of a single line for a five, which is 500x the bet, for a total of 5,000x the bet.

Similar slot machines include Book of Dead, the slot machine produced by Play 'N Go that takes you on a journey to popular ancient Egypt. It allows you to land excellently designed symbols historically present in the North African country across five reels and 10 paylines. The game offers the chance of a solid win, with a top-paying symbol of 1000x on the bet line. The ten paylines can accept bets ranging from 10 cents to 100 euros, and players can trigger a bonus feature and get the help of the game's free spins by landing three or more of the book symbols, which represent the game's scatter. The player can reactivate another 10 free spins with another spin aided by the scatter win.

Naturally, on the reels, there's a bad guy trying to stop Lara from taking home the riches. The game window is in front of the entrance to the hidden temple, with pay symbols resting on stones that need to be removed in order to enter. The stones shake with each new tumble of paying symbols, while a suspenseful soundtrack increases the expectations of finding vast treasures.

All paying symbols stand on giant rocks that roll on the game window instead of the usual reel spin. The lower part is made up of Maya-style card gifts from 10s to aces, while the premium symbols are two Maya artifacts, the bad guy who brings out a gun, and the same Lara Jones. They pay for a single five of a range from 10x to 500x your bet. The intricate looking ancient Book of Souls is the scatter and wild symbol on the reels.

Hit at least three scatters anywhere on the reels to trigger 10 free spins, which can be re-triggered indefinitely. Additionally, a win of 2x, 20x, and 200x is awarded for three, four, and five scatters. Before the start of the bonus round, one of the nine regular pay symbols is selected as the special symbol. When enough land on a free spin, they expand vertically to cover the entire reel, and prize wins for all paylines are paid on top of any potential line win.
